history.proof: intros a b aL H. induction aL as [|x xs IH]. - simpl in H. destruct H as [H | H]. -- left. qsimpl time: 1. -- contradiction. - simpl in H. destruct H as [H | H]. -- hauto lq: on depth: 3. -- destruct H as [H | H]. left. ++ right.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM H : b = a Unable to unify "b = a" with "a = b".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b, x : poly A0 eqA ltM xs : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H : x = a IH : In a (addEnd b xs) -> a = b \\/ In a xs Unable to unify "x = a" with "a = b".
Wrong bullet --: Current bullet -- is not finished.

original: intros a b aL H. induction aL as [|x xs IH]. - simpl in H. destruct H as [H | H]. -- left. apply H. -- contradiction. - simpl in H. destruct H as [H | H]. -- left. apply H. -- apply IH in H. destruct H as [H | H]. ++ left. apply H. ++ right. right. apply H.
